column4: Hello , My XServer crashed so i reinstalled it , but now after re-installation even login screen in not coming. Please help
I just reinstalled xserver-xorg using apt-get
hummmmm..... interesting.  So what do you get when it finishes booting up?
What happens when you do Ctrl-Alt-F6 ?
yes it gives me terminal prompt
Does it say "file not found"  or....?
I just found that there is a xorg.conf.bak , just renamed it and it worked
Does the output of  ps aux |grep gdm   only show one line?
